resources.string: <t_tip>No NFC hardware found, NFcard will NOT work.</t_tip>

NFC hardware has been disabled, Please enable it first.

Touch HERE to turn it on.
<t_tip>No card has been read, Please take the card near to the back cover of phone and try again.</t_tip>

Error occurred when reading card
When reading card, Please take your card close to the NFC antenna of phone (Normally, It is at back cover of the phone) and hold a few seconds so that program can read data out. If fails too much, you can try turn off then on NFC and read agian.

Unknown card
Touch HERE to see currently supported cards.
Card information has been copied to clipboard

NFCard can read contactless IC card use NFC hadware.

Support ISO7816-4, Felica compliant e-purse/e-cash, It can read account validity, offline balance and transaction logs from these cards if no read restriction.

So far we\'ve confirmed the following can be read: Shenzhen Tong (newer version) of Shenzhen, Shanghai Card, Octopus Card of Hongkong, Beijing Municipal Card (newer version), Changan Card of Shaanxi,Xi\'an, Wuhan City Smart Card, Quickpass (China, e-cash), T-Union (China, e-purse & e-cash), City Union (China).

Newest version and source code can be found at github.com/sinpolib/nfcard

By Sinpo Lib, 2015.
